import "./Panier.css"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Panier() { let panier = localStorage.getItem("panier"); let p = JSON.parse(panier); let Navigate = useNavigate(); let newlist={ "nbCommqnde": "", "libelle": "", "prix": "", "img": "", "Quantité": "", } let handelNavigate = () => { Navigate("/"); }; let handelAffich = () => { let section = document.getElementsByClassName("commander")[0]; section.setAttribute('class','affich'); console.log(section) }; let supprimer=()=>{ let x=document.getElementById('enreg'); x.setAttribute('class','commander') document.getElementById('commande').setAttribute('disabled',true) localStorage.setItem('panier', JSON.stringify(newlist)) console.log(p) } return (
Article Libelle Prix Quantites total Supprimer
{p.libelle} {p.prix} {p.Quantité} {p.prix}
